content: It's a combination of both. While some people may naturally possess these traits, others can develop them through practice and experience. For instance, leaders can work on building trust and empathy by actively listening to their employees and responding to their needs. They can develop a clear vision and focus by setting goals and priorities for themselves and their team. Additionally, leaders can build resilience by maintaining a positive attitude and learning from setbacks and challenges. So, while some may be born with certain leadership qualities, others can develop these traits through intention, effort, and experience.
